chunks.text_preview: Discover Uruga 42mm Leather | Minase Watches |Made in Japan. Uruga 42mm leather is powered with a high quality Swiss movement, every steel parts is hand-polished with the Sallaz (sarazu) technique.. ProductGroup. Leather straps. QuantitativeValue. QuantitativeValue. QuantitativeValue. QuantitativeVa

. Uruga 42mm Leather's design is inspired by gems setting. The whole is more round, more classic than the other Minase timepieces and the collection's name clearly represents this novel approach. “Uruga” is an acronym of the Japanese words "Uruwashii" and "Myabi" (pronounced "ga") meaning respective

static_fields.name: Discover Uruga 42mm Leather | Minase Watches |Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Uruga 42mm leather is powered with a high quality Swiss movement, every steel parts is hand-polished with the Sallaz (sarazu) technique.

hasVariant.name: Uruga 42mm Leather - Ice Blue
hasVariant.description: Uruga 42mm Leather's design is inspired by gems setting. The whole is more round, more classic than the other Minase timepieces and the collection's name clearly represents this novel approach. “Uruga” is an acronym of the Japanese words "Uruwashii" and "Myabi" (pronounced "ga") meaning respectively beauty and elegance. Its case only is made of 27 pieces.
